divs: Sighting DetailsStar like object moved from Whippany, NJ towards NYC. Moon was directly above my house tonight and as always I looked up at the moon. I saw the star like object near the moon and then realized it was moving. It did not change course and continued on toward NYC. It looked exactly like a star same size and brightness. The object never flashed or changed color. It was to high up to be an aircraft and as I said it did not have any flashing lights as most commercial aircraft have. The sky was very very clear tonight and in no way to I believe this was an airplane or a satellite.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Madison
There were no other sightings in Madison on or around March 3rd 2009
Summary: Star like object (size and color) moved across the sky at very high altitude.
